abstract: Robert J. McCann, the former head of Merrill Lynch’s wealth management unit, plans to ask a New York state judge on Wednesday to grant him ”emergency” relief that would force Bank of America to allow him take another job.
snippet: Robert J. McCann, the former head of Merrill Lynch’s wealth management unit, plans to ask a New York state judge on Wednesday to grant him ”emergency” relief that would force Bank of America to allow him take another job.
lead_paragraph: Robert J. McCann, the former head of Merrill Lynch’s wealth management unit, plans to ask a New York state judge on Wednesday to grant him “emergency” relief that would force Bank of America to allow him take another job.

headline.main: McCann Is Taking Aim at Bank of America in Court
